alt-3.uk
  • Leagues
  • About

    At alt-3.uk we provide better league tables, for some of the most prominent football (soccer) leagues.

    The tables given here are better because, during the football season, they are usually more informative than the standard kind of league table based on accumulated points to date.

    For the mathematics behind this, and for other background information, please follow the About alt-3.uk link.
